name: Repulsanoid Demo
description:
Repulsanoid is a unique 3D puzzle, where you control the playable area, rather than a character.

It's a stress-free, but engaging test of your reflexes and 3D thinking.

Here we present to you a short demo version of the full game, which is currently on Steam Greenlight at: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
